mapper.insert: insert into sys_facilities_category( code, name, num, create_id, create_date, is_delete )values ( #{code}, #{name}, #{num}, #{createId}, #{createDate}, #{isDelete} )
mapper.select: select sfc.id,sfc.code,sfc.name,su.actual_name as create_name,sfc.num,sfc.create_date,su.tel from sys_facilities_category as sfc,sys_user as su where sfc.create_id = su.id and sfc.id = #{id} and sfc.is_delete = 1
